text: Shemar Franklin Moore (born April 20, 1970) is an American actor. He is known for playing many characters of television. These include Malcolm Winters on The Young and the Restless, Derek Morgan on Criminal Minds and Sergeant II Daniel "Hondo" Harrelson on S.W.A.T.. All of these series were on CBS. Moore was also a host of Soul Train from 1999 to 2003. Moore has won eight NAACP Image Awards. He also won the 2000 Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series for his work on The Young and the Restless. He was nominated for a People's Choice Award in 2016 for his work on Criminal Minds. Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:actors from Oakland, California Category:American television actors
title: Shemar Moore
